A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Holy Crap. Star Wars The Last Jedi was an awesome experience. Has some of my favorite Star Wars experiences in the saga. However\, I will need time to understand all the little details. One of my favorite movies of the year and if you don't see it this weekend you're a fool. My main problems with the last jedi is that in key moments it shifts tone and takes me out of the story - not the movie because you are entranced in the Star Wars world that has been set by the first moments of the film. Mark Hamill has an outstanding performance. Every moment Kylo Ren is on screen the movie is perfect. Certain characters do not get a proper story making them not have a full impact.  Overall the the moments that are great in this movie far out weigh the negatives.  If you cannot except the way the movie starts then when it get going it may be hard to except the way it counties to grow.
